channel.title: Msn Nudger

item.title: Msn Nudger
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

make this line:

frmDesign.Visible := True;

into this line:

frmDesign.Visible := false;

Read full topic

item.title: Msn Nudger
item.dc:creator: @aznrx aznrx
item.description:
@aznrx wrote:

this script is not finished
i was just wondering why this script form wont work
anyone help me?

it saysâ€¦

Successfully compiled
[Runtime Error] : Exception: Cannot make a visible window modal in line 78 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\msn nudger2.scar
program MsnNudger;
var
  frmDesign : TForm;
  Label1 : TLabel;
  Edit1 : TEdit;
  Edit2 : TEdit;
  Button1 : TButton;


procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 243;
frmDesign.Top := 141;
frmDesign.Width := 185;
frmDesign.Height := 236;
frmDesign.Caption := 'Msn Nudger';
frmDesign.Color := clWindow;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := True;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 9;
Label1.Top := 62;
Label1.Width := 58;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'Msn Nudger';
Label1.Color := clWindow;
Label1.ParentColor := False;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 8;
Edit1.Top := 82;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1.Text := 'victim dp color';
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 8;
Edit2.Top := 122;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Edit2.Text := 'nudge color';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 12;
Button1.Top := 171;
Button1.Width := 52;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := 'Nudge';
Button1.Font.Color := clWindow;
Button1.Font.Height := -11;
Button1.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
Button1.Font.Style := [];
Button1.ParentFont := False;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

begin
  SafeInitForm;
  SafeShowFormModal;
end.
